title: Spotify
description: Spotify is a digital music, podcast, and video service that gives you access to millions of songs and other content from creators all over the world.

title: Youtube
description: YouTube is a free video sharing website that makes it easy to watch online videos. You can even create and upload your own videos to share with others.

title: Soundcloud
description: SoundCloud first entered the music streaming industry as a new way for artists to share and promote their music. As an online platform, artists can release music without a record label or distributor.
